title: Partner / Invest
subtitle: Join the Ecosystem
description: Impact investors, foundations, and municipal partnersâ€”explore opportunities to partner with Banor Group.
intro: Banor Group seeks mission-aligned partners: impact investors for capital deployment, foundations for workforce program funding, and municipal partners for land and policy support.

items.title: Impact Investors
items.description: Accredited investors seeking financial returns and measurable social impact. Fund redevelopment projects and scale the model.

items.title: Foundations
items.description: Philanthropic partners for Foundation workforce programs. Concessional or grant capital.

items.title: Municipal Partners
items.description: Cities, land banks, and redevelopment authorities. Land disposition, tax incentives, and policy alignment.

sections.title: Start the Conversation
sections.content: Tell us about your interest. We'll respond within 48 hours.
